welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hammersmith, where the Thames flows and the charm of this historic district invites you to explore its vibrant streets, bustling markets, and renowned live music scene. We hope you enjoy your time here and discover all this beautiful city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mostly domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mostly European and long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The second oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mostly long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The second newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mostly long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mostly long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with a 45-minute time limit per device. Premium Wi-Fi is also available for a fee.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the busiest terminal, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport serves a variety of airlines and destinations, with a focus on low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a premium option for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Farnborough Airport caters to private and executive flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Blackbushe Airport caters to private and executive flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
